statements: DELETE FROM user_engagement_data WHERE engagement_score < 50 AND engagement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_engagement_data WHERE user_id = 100 AND engagement_score > 50;
DELETE FROM user_engagement_data WHERE email = 'test@example.com' OR (engagement_score <= 20 AND engagement_date < '2022-01-01 00:00:00');
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 123 AND status = 'active';
DELETE FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'click' AND user_id = 456;
DELETE FROM emails WHERE clicked = TRUE;
DELETE FROM email_logs WHERE log_id = 123 AND recipient_email = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 456 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
